    Projects

    CS program Alumnae/i career path analysis

    Sep 2018 – Present

    With having a legitimate database of CS alumnae/i containing their professional experience after graduation, aiming to answer frequently asked questions about career path of alumnae/i.

    • Number and percentage of alumnae/i holding tech position of in tech company?
    • Time spent on launching first job?
    • How long did the first job last?
    • What skill built in school contributed most to their success?

    Health Insurance premium predictor

    Mar 2018 – May 2018
    • Course project of Data Analysis, using Python3.6, Anaconda, and PyCharm.
    • Applied machine learning algorithm on health insurance data.
    • Evaluated the efficiency of different supervised and unsupervised models and decided the premium prediction model.

    Workshop system project

    Jan 2018 – May 2018
    • Course project of Cloud Data, Apps, Analytics, using Salesforce developer.
    • Created a system of student and adult workshops based on brochure.
    • Implemented with using apex class, trigger, validation rules, workflow roles, etc.

    Bookmark app

    Nov 2017 – Dec 2017
    • Course project of iOS development with Swift, using Swift 4 , and Xcode.
    • Created an iOS app for bookmarking viewed webpage with WebView, TableView and Core Data in Swift 4.

    OpenGL Demo

    Aug 2017 – Dec 2017
    • Course project of Computer Graphic, using OpenGL, and Java8
    • Demo contains 2D/3D glyph drawing with ear-clipping algorithm with cutting holes, torus and sphere tessellation and texturing.
